ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, stems removed

cookingTips: Choose mushrooms that are uniform in size for even cooking
Brown sausage completely and break it into fine crumbles while cooking
Fill mushroom caps and bake at 350°F for 15-20 minutes until golden
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide selection of appropriate mushrooms, sausage browning technique, and baking time for tender mushrooms.
